name: Tax levy, in general
text:
PART I.  GENERAL PROVISIONS

 
	    There shall be levied and assessed upon each public service company a tax in the manner provided by this chapter. [L 1932 2d, c 43, §1; am L 1933, c 183, §2; RL 1935, §2140; RL 1945, §5671; RL 1955, §126-1; am L Sp 1957, c 1, §9(a); am L 1963, c 147, §2(b); HRS ]
